sub_topic: Probability of a certain type of natural disaster occurring in a region
message_1: A region experiences a flood once every 10 years on average. What is the probability of this region experiencing a flood in the next year? Round your answer to the nearest hundredth.
message_2:
Since the region experiences a flood once every 10 years on average, the probability of a flood occurring in any given year is 1/10 or 0.1. 

Rounded to the nearest hundredth, the probability of a flood occurring in the next year is 0.10 or 10%.
